content: अभिपन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Gone or come near, approached, run towards, gone to (a state &c.); त्वमन्यमाकारमिवाभिपन्नः <ls>Ki. 3. 46.</ls> {@--2@} Fled, fugitive, seeking refuge with. {@--3@} Subdued, overpowered, afflicted, seized &c.; कालाभिपन्नाः सीदंति सिकतासेतवो यथा <ls>Rām.</ls>; यदिदं सर्वं मृत्युनाभिपन्नं <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; दोष°, कश्मल°, व्याघ्र° &c. {@--4@} Unfortunate, fallen into difficulties &c. {@--5@} Accepted. {@--6@} Guilty. {@--7@} Removed to a distance. {@--8@} Dead.
